phrases: Do not disappear on me all of a sudden!
It is dangerous if we do not hold hands.
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as Iam with you, Iam happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
Were there always this many parents with their kids here?
What am I supposed to match it to?
You do not need a skirt?
All you have got are pants.
Skirts are not allowed at nursery school.
We are almost there, so stick it out.
We will be home in a minute, so...
You always bring me crap I do not need!
I am going to lose my temper!
Yes, this is the Maeda residence.
Oh, please accept my condolences over your sudden loss.
Sorry, I did not know your cell number.
Tell me, how do you register for nursery school?
You really did take Rin-chan home?!
What do you mean, for now?
So, anyway, I cannot take off work tomorrow.
What kind of procedures need to be followed?
Look, you cannot just get accepted instantly.
Can you do something on your end?
For starters, I would go consult with the city office...
There is an emergency temporary nursery school...
I am almost done, so wait!
Haruko-san, I am going to turn off the miso soup.
It sounds like you are busy, so I will call back later...
Man, there is hardly any of them...
So, my commute time is suddenly doubled...?
This one's pretty close, but I cannot get out of the office by six...
This looks like a good one,
but they will accept kids on an emergency basis for only 10 days...
About the nursery school we are going to today...
Thank you for the food I am about to eat!
You are not supposed to eat with your elbow on the table!
Listen, the nursery school you are going to today is only a temporary deal.
Only until we find you a place that will officially let you attend.
Would you be embarrassed if other kids saw me carry you or something?
Well, please take good care of her.
Do not look at me like that!
I will not be able to make it back while it is still light out,
but I will come as fast as I can.
That is not how the song goes!
I did not take your feelings into consideration.
You had nothing to do with your mother's circumstances or Grandpa's lifespan,
and yet you were left behind with the lonely reality.
Did you think I was going to leave you behind too?
I will never let that happen to you again...
I need to leave a little early today...
Then I will see you in a bit.
Working really hard from the beginning of the month, huh?
Take a photo of this sample.
You have got a call from outside line 4, about the private viewing.
Go and put your regular clothes on.
Rin-chan, do not break it, okay?
Kawachi-san, let us grab some dinner.
It is Miyata-san from Mitsutomo Trading.
I will be able to leave my company in a few more minutes, so...
This nursery school is so far!
Not like I need to worry,
but what will happen if I get a girlfriend?
Kawachi, this is what you sent out yesterday, is not it?
I already apologized to the recipient, so...
We have not gone out drinking for a while.
I have got something tomorrow, too...
Good for you, you sly dog.
How long can I keep up this lifestyle?
but her mother and child health handbook and important documents are in here.
Even if it is only for a short period of time,
raising a child is a very difficult thing.
It is Rin who has it the most difficult...
I am just going to take a peek...
She is got the same mouth...
All the relatives are talking about you like you are some foul villain.
But I wonder what the truth is...
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
In fact, you are sleeping over there now...
Help me take the sheet off.
I am saying it is sweat too, are not I?!
